import React from 'react' import './booking.css' import { FormGroup,Form,ListGroup,ListGroupItem,Button } from 'reactstrap' const Booking = ({tour,avgRating}) => { const {price,reviews} = tour return ( <>

${price}/per person

{avgRating===0? null : avgRating} ({reviews?.length})
{/* Booking form starts */}
Information
{/* Booking form ends */}
) } export default Booking
